Fun Fact

My first invention

I filed a patent application at the age of 17 for the invention of a slot loading optical disc case.

GoPulse

Social News Platform

GoPulse is my personal attempt to reform the broken news distribution channels we have now. Between the amount of hate on Twitter, the misinformation on Facebook, the polorizing suggestion algorithms on YouTube and the ever present advertsing business model has many people longing for a simple, friendly, and informative platform to get their news from. I propose GoPulse, a subscription based social news aggregator. Try it out and leave me some feedback. tom@gopule.io

Hyper_Rank

Collaborative Filtering Algorithm

Hyper Rank is user-user collaborative filtering algorithm that I have implemented here in Python. It is open source, can be used with any form of content and is designed to be extremeley sensistive with small inputs so it is an excellent choice for apps with a small userbase.
